import React, {useContext} from 'react' import styles from'./Checkout.module.css' import CartContext from '../store/CartContext' import CheckoutItem from './CheckoutItem' import Backdrop from '../UI/Backdrop/Backdrop' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faClose, faCartShopping } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' export default function Checkout(props) { const cartdata = useContext(CartContext) return (
Cart
{cartdata.cartItems.map(item => )}
{props.sum}
{cartdata.sumNumber === 0?
未选购商品
: (
¥ {cartdata.sumPrice}
)}
) }
